${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ManyTap.NAME: Many Tap
${modID}:ManyTap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to the enemy NL 5 times

${modID}:EnoughWeakness.NAME: Enough Weakness
${modID}:EnoughWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Demon Form Equal to your Debuffs

${modID}:UnrelentingAttack.NAME: Unrelenting Attack
${modID}:UnrelentingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damagae to a random enemy for every me there are in your deck

${modID}:ReverseHeal.NAME: Reverse Heal
${modID}:ReverseHeal.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 hp NL Deal !D! damage !M! times

${modID}:BulkTrain.NAME: Bulk Train
${modID}:BulkTrain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength NL Increase this by 1 this combat
${modID}:BulkTrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! NL Increase this by 2 this combat

${modID}:Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
${modID}:Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Dead !D! Damage NL Gain !M! Energy if you have a debuff

${modID}:Stroid.NAME: Str-oid
${modID}:Stroid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength NL Loose 10 Strength next turn

${modID}:OffenseIsDefense.NAME: Offense Is Defense
${modID}:OffenseIsDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain Metallicize Equal to !M!% of your Strength

${modID}:DevilsDeal.NAME: Devil's Deal
${modID}:DevilsDeal.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Hp NL Gain !M! Demon Form
